entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HorizontalOption End does not work on a HorizontalStackedLayout on both Android and iOS #20952
  • on iOS, a control derived from Entry does not display the same of Entry #20951
  • Add a cancel event and/or command to the MAUI SearchBar control #20946
  • Hot Reload Button issue #20945
  • <Border /> property is not working while I write <Label /> property and passing a Text="", text is not being shown in the android emulator. #20944
  • Border does not resize correctly (android) #20943
  • Grid.Add() with no column information causes views to overlap/Horizontal layout semantics #20941
  • SwipeView does not animate correctly if there is no BackgroundColor in the #20939
  • Using MAUI: Touch regions are rendered as a box in an AbsoluteLayout. #20938

Closed

  • Implementation of multiple stack layout issue in dotnet 8 LTS MAUI #20947
  • Bugs in catching error. #20948
  • How to make animation rate smooth #12385
    Backlog
  • FFImageLoading CacheImage cause to crash app on IOS #20937
  • MtouchInterpreter doesn't seem to exclude dlls listed #20932
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #17909

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix image loading tests #20955
  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix image button scaling #20949
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Merge net9.0 to 9.0.100-preview2 #20942
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Maps Project API Docs #20893
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • Improve WebAuthenticator API docs with exceptions #20860
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20935
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20936
  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • [WIP] Testing timeouts for iOS device tests #20843
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
